price: 59. con la excepción de su familia, pues a esta la salvaremos,
arabic: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: illā āla lūṭin innā lamunajjūhum ajmaʿīna
